mfa.title: Two-Factor Authentication
mfa.setupDescription: Scan the QR code below with your authenticator app (Google Authenticator, Authy, etc.)
mfa.scanQrCode: Scan this QR code with your authenticator app
mfa.verifySetup: Enter the 6-digit code from your app to verify
mfa.recoveryCodeInfo: Save this code in a safe place. You can provide it to a system administrator to recover your account if you lose access to your authenticator app.
mfa.verifyDescription: Enter the 6-digit code from your authenticator app
mfa.tooManyAttempts: Too many failed attempts. Please try again later.
mfa.disableDescription: Enter your 2FA code to confirm disabling two-factor authentication
mfa.disableWarning: This will make your account less secure. Are you sure?
mfa.setupCompleteDescription: Two-factor authentication has been enabled for your account. Make sure to save your recovery code!
mfa.regenerateRecoveryCodeWarning: This will invalidate your current recovery code
mfa.regenerateRecoveryCodeDescription: Enter your 2FA code to generate a new recovery code. Your old code will no longer work.
mfa.recoveryCodeRegeneratedInfo: Your new recovery code has been generated. Save it in a safe place - this is the only time you'll see it.
mfa.recoveryCodeProfileDescription: Use this code for account recovery if you lose access to your authenticator app

settings.title: Settings
settings.customTranslationsInfo: Want to add your own language?
settings.choosePreferredTheme: Choose your preferred theme across all devices.
settings.selectDefaultPageAfterLogin: Select the default page to load after logging in.
settings.chooseFileRenameMode: Choose how files are renamed when saving notes and checklists.
settings.chooseHandedness: Choose if you are right-handed or left-handed.
settings.chooseAutoSaveInterval: Choose the interval for automatic saving of your notes.
settings.chooseNotesDefaultMode: Choose if the note is automatically in edit mode or not {mode} button in the note editor).
settings.chooseDefaultEditor: Choose the default editor for your notes - (you can always switch by clicking on the {editor} button in the note editor).
settings.chooseTableSyntax: Choose how tables are rendered in your notes.
settings.chooseSyntaxTheme: Choose the syntax highlighting theme for the markdown editor.
settings.minimalModeDescription: When enabled, uses a simple markdown renderer instead of the rich text editor. Advanced features like bilateral linking will not work in this mode.
settings.chooseDefaultNoteFilter: Choose the default filter to apply when opening the Notes page.
settings.selectEnableRecurring: Select enable to add recurring checklists
settings.selectShowCompletedSuggestions: Select whether to show completed tasks as suggestions
settings.completedSuggestionsDescription: When adding new tasks, show completed tasks as suggestions that can be re-enabled.
settings.chooseDefaultChecklistFilter: Choose the default filter to apply when opening the Checklists page.
settings.deleteAccountDescription: Permanently delete your account and all associated data
settings.chooseQuickCreateNotes: Choose the quick create notes mode.
settings.quickCreateNotesDescription: When enabled, creating a new note skips the create note modal and gets you straight to the note editor.
settings.defaultCategory: Default category for quick create notes
settings.defaultCategoryDescription: New notes will be created in this category when using quick create.

customTheme.sampleNoteContent:
# Project Brainstorm

## Mobile App Features
- **Dark mode toggle** with smooth transitions
- **Offline support** for critical features
- **Push notifications** for reminders

## Backend Improvements
- **API rate limiting** to prevent abuse
- **Database optimization** for faster queries
- **Caching layer** for improved performance

*This is just a preview of the note content...*

admin.title: Admin
admin.deleteUserConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete user "{username}"? This action cannot be undone.
admin.maxFileSizeDescription: The maximum file size allowed for uploads in MB (applies to images, videos, and files)
admin.applicationNameDescription: Appears in the browser tab and PWA name.
admin.applicationDescriptionText: Used for search engines and PWA description.
admin.applicationDescriptionPlaceholder: A simple, fast, and lightweight checklist...
admin.icon512Description: High-resolution icon for PWA splash screens.
admin.thisUsesGithubAPI: This uses the GitHub API to fetch updates, disabling fully disables the API and doesn't allow any traffic in and out from github.
admin.parseContentEnabledDescription: When enabled this setting will show the parsed titles in the sidebar, search results, and overall across the app.
admin.parseContentDisabledDescription: When disabled, the original file names will be sanitised, made human readable and shown instead.
admin.parseContentPerformanceWarning: Setting this to "no" will improve performance on large datasets but may impact readability - especially on filenames with non latin characters.
admin.noCustomThemesYet: No custom themes created yet. Click "Create Theme" to get started.
admin.noUsersMatchSearch: No users match your search criteria.
admin.usersWillAppear: Users will appear here once they register.
admin.configureEditorFeatures: Configure which editor features are enabled for all users.
admin.enableSlashCommandsDescription: Enable the slash command menu (type "/" to insert elements)
admin.enableBubbleMenuDescription: Enable the floating toolbar that appears when text is selected
admin.enableTableToolbarDescription: Enable the toolbar that appears when editing tables
admin.bilateralLinksDescription: Enable the ability to link to notes and checklists in the same document.
admin.bilateralLinksWarning: This feature is experimental and may not work as expected. It may also end up being removed/deprecated in the future.
admin.configureExternalServices: Configure external service URLs for editor integrations.
admin.drawioUrlDescription: Specify a custom Draw.io instance URL. Leave empty to use the default public instance (https://embed.diagrams.net).
admin.drawioProxyEnabledDescription: Enable this to route Draw.io traffic through Jotty's server. Required for internal Docker network URLs (e.g., http://drawio:8080) that aren't accessible from users' browsers.
admin.excalidrawUrlDescription: Specify a custom Excalidraw instance URL. Leave empty to use the default public instance (https://excalidraw.com).
admin.excalidrawProxyEnabledDescription: Enable this to route Excalidraw traffic through Jotty's server. Required for internal Docker network URLs (e.g., http://excalidraw:3000) that aren't accessible from users' browsers.
admin.noEmojisYet: No custom emojis created yet. Click "Add Emoji" to get started.
admin.enterAnyEmoji: Enter any emoji or use emoji picker (Win: Win+.; Mac: Ctrl+Cmd+Space
admin.detailedSharingBreakdown: Detailed breakdown of sharing patterns and user engagement
admin.failedToRebuildIndex: Failed to rebuild link index for {username}
admin.adminContentAccessDescription: Controls whether administrators can access all users' notes and checklists. When disabled, admins can only manage users and settings but cannot view other users' content.
admin.adminContentAccessNo: Admins can only access their own content
admin.cannotDeleteSuperAdmin: Cannot delete the super admin (system owner)
admin.selectExportType: Select an export type and download data from your application.
admin.allChecklistsAndNotesDescription: Exports all checklists and notes created by all users. This will generate a zip file containing JSON data organized by user and category.
admin.userChecklistsNotesDescription: Select a user from the dropdown to export all checklists and notes belonging to that specific user.
admin.allUsersDataDescription: Exports a JSON file with all user account info (usernames, admin status, etc.). This does NOT include their checklist or note content.
admin.wholeDataFolderDescription: Exports the entire 'data' folder, including all user content, metadata, and settings. Use with caution as this can be a large file.
admin.noSharingPermissionsLabel: Specific shared items are hidden based on your content access permissions.
admin.viewOnlySettingsNotice: Only the system owner can modify these settings.
admin.maxLogAgeDaysDescription: Set how long audit logs are retained. When viewing the audit logs page, you'll be prompted to clean up logs older than this threshold. Set to 0 for unlimited retention (no automatic cleanup prompts).
admin.userHasNoContent: This user hasn't created any checklists or notes.
admin.deleteUserConfirmAdmin: Are you sure you want to delete user "{username}"? This action cannot be undone.
admin.deleteAccountWarning: Warning: This action cannot be undone

errors.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 6 characters long
errors.deleteUserConfirmation: Delete user "{username}"? This cannot be undone.

sharing.makeItemAccessible: Make this {itemType} accessible to anyone with the link.

encryption.privateKeyWarning: WARNING: Your private key allows decryption of all encrypted notes. Only export if you understand the security implications. Continue?
encryption.noteProtectedWith: This note is protected with {type} encryption.
encryption.pgpDescription: PGP: Traditional public-key cryptography with key pair management
encryption.generateOrImportKeys: Generate a new key pair or import existing keys to enable note encryption.
encryption.keysDisabledInDemo: Stored encryption keys are disabled in demo mode.
encryption.promptForPassphrase: Prompt for passphrase when opening encrypted notes
encryption.promptForPassphraseDescription: If enabled, you will be prompted for your passphrase when opening an encrypted note. The note will stay encrypted on the server, but you will be able to see the decrypted content in the current tab session.
encryption.customKeyPathDescription: Specify a custom (absolute) filesystem path for storing encryption keys. This is only needed for local installations. Docker users should map the default path in docker-compose.yml instead.
encryption.customPathHelp: Must be an absolute path (e.g., /home/user/my-keys or C:\Users\user\my-keys)
encryption.customPathDisabledInDemo: Custom key path is disabled in demo mode
encryption.deleteKeysConfirmMessage: This will permanently delete your encryption keys. You will NOT be able to decrypt any encrypted notes without re-importing your private key. This action cannot be undone.
encryption.autoSaveDisabledForEncrypted: Auto-save is disabled for encrypted notes. Remember to save manually!
encryption.enterPassphraseToEdit: Enter your passphrase to edit this encrypted note
encryption.noteWillStayEncrypted: The note will remain encrypted on the server
encryption.enterPassphraseToSave: Enter your passphrase to save the note
encryption.noteWillBeEncryptedBeforeSaving: Note content will be encrypted before saving
encryption.noteWillBeDecryptedForViewing: Note content will be decrypted for viewing only
encryption.noteContentWillBeEncrypted: Note content will be encrypted with XChaCha20-Poly1305
encryption.onlySomeoneWithPassphraseCanDecrypt: Only someone with the passphrase can decrypt it
encryption.passphraseNeverStoredOnServer: Your passphrase will NEVER be stored on the server
encryption.thisWillDecryptNote: This will decrypt the note content
encryption.noteWillBeRestoredAsUnencrypted: Note content will be restored as unencrypted
encryption.youWillBeAbleToEditAfterDecryption: You will be able to edit the note content after decryption
encryption.publicKeyRequired: Public key is required. You don't have any stored keys.
encryption.privateKeyRequiredForSigning: Private key is required for signing
encryption.signatureInvalid: Warning: Signature invalid or could not be verified.
encryption.noEncryptionKeysConfigured: You don't have any encryption keys configured
encryption.pastePublicKeyBelow: Please paste a public key below to encrypt the note content
encryption.generateOrImportKeysInProfile: You can generate or import specific keys for Jotty in Profile ‚Üí Encryption
encryption.noteContentWillBeEncryptedWithPGP: Note content will be encrypted with PGP
encryption.onlySomeoneWithPrivateKeyCanDecrypt: Only someone with the private key/passphrase can decrypt it
encryption.incorrectPassphraseForXChaChaSave: Incorrect passphrase provided for XChaCha save
encryption.rememberPassphraseCannotRecover: Remember your passphrase! It cannot be recovered.
encryption.withoutPassphraseCannotDecrypt: Without the passphrase, you cannot decrypt your notes.
encryption.keysSavedSecurely: Your keys have been saved securely.
encryption.pasteAsciiArmoredKeys: Paste your ASCII-armored PGP keys below
encryption.keysWillBeSecurelyStored: Your keys will be securely stored
encryption.bothKeysRequired: Both public and private keys are required
encryption.invalidPublicKeyFormat: Invalid public key format. Must be ASCII-armored PGP key.
encryption.invalidPrivateKeyFormat: Invalid private key format. Must be ASCII-armored PGP key.

auditLogs.title: Audit Logs
auditLogs.noLogsDescription: No activity has been recorded yet.
auditLogs.confirmCleanup: Are you sure you want to delete logs older than {days} days? This will affect ALL users and cannot be undone.
auditLogs.confirmCleanupUnlimited: No automatic cleanup is configured (unlimited retention). You can still manually delete old logs if needed.
auditLogs.deleteAllLogsWarning: This will delete ALL logs, not just old ones
auditLogs.deleteAllLogsWarningDescription: The entire audit log history will be erased from the system.
auditLogs.userDescription: View all your activity and actions in the system
auditLogs.adminDescription: View and manage all user activity across the system
auditLogs.oldLogsFound: There are {count} log files older than {days} days.
auditLogs.oldLogsFoundDescription: Would you like to clean them up? This action cannot be undone.

notFound.title: Page Not Found
notFound.imNoPoet: I am no poet, and nor is Jotty. These are random words in sequence.
